work.title: Shoreline Software SWE (Part-time)
work.description:
Building a full-featured demo app that will be used to provide product comparison to potential customers
The app ingests data from competitors as well as our marquee product, showing side by side comparisons and highlighting the advantages of our product

projects.title: Keyboard Hero
projects.description:
Being an embedded systems project, C was used to program an ATmega1284 to run a game called Keyboard Hero based off of the popular game Guitar Hero.
Hardware such as shift registers, a LCD Screen, and a LED Matrix were used to implement the game.

projects.title: sentimentalgifts.shop
projects.description: Used CSS, HTML, and Bootstrap 4 to create a fully responsive website for a U.K. based company

projects.title: Rshell
projects.description:
Used APIs, system calls, and data structures to create a shell program inspired from Bash
Developed support for commands, nested parentheses and quotations, and file redirection

projects.title: Spyfall
projects.description:
Constructed an Android app, now in launch readiness phase
Programed algorithms to send SMS messages to contacts, chosen as players, giving each a role

projects.title: Plex Media Server
projects.description: Created and maintained a media server to stream my movies remotely

projects.title: Ocular-Echo
projects.description: To help the visually impaired, made hardware that provides tactile feedback as the wearer comes into proximity of potentially hazardous objects

projects.title: Trees
projects.description: Created AVL and 2-3 trees with preorder, inorder, and postorder transversals

projects.title: Golden Bear Claw Adv.
projects.description:
Fabricated game concepts and created a text-based adventure game using
Created object models to parse user input, generate maps, and place items

projects.title: Custom Arduino Radio
projects.description:
Designed a schematic and engineered a radio working primarily off of an Arduino Uno
Programed Arduino to receive bluetooth packages and control the radio appropriately including being able to scan and set favorite channels

projects.title: Bulletin Board
projects.description: Made a bulletin board using objects to create messages and replies

projects.title: Battleship
projects.description:
Replicated game form and constructed maps with randomly placed ships
Programmed AI to play with random attacks, not allowing repetition

projects.title: The Toothpick Game
projects.description: Created options for playing against another person or against an AI with three difficulties
